Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Sad>Snowfield Stable was so generous to
donate these supplies...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0201>And then <clr:0000>flying monsters <clr:ffff>find me while
I'm taking them to Rito Village? What kind
of luck is that?
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Admiration_00>You...<sp:5:1:0> You can defeat those flying
<clr:0000>monsters <clr:ffff>on your own?

Well, um... <sp:5:1:0>Great!
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Chat_01>What the... You don't even have wings.
How'd you fight monsters so high up?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Eh, who cares? What matters is you did it!
Great work!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Now I can get these supplies from
Snowfield Stable back to my village.<sp:0:4:0>Please, let me give you something for
your efforts.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Understand_00>It's less than you deserve, but it's also
all I have.
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Shitauchi_00>I just couldn't risk turning my attention
away from the supplies.

<sp:3:0:2:0501>So instead, I set a signal fire and waited
for help to arrive.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad_01>But trust me... <sp:5:0:0>If I had my way, we'd be
having this conversation over two big
bowls of flying-thing soup.
Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad_00>But against a swarm, there wasn't much
I could do but set a signal fire and wait for
help to arrive.
<sp:3:0:2:0501>Sadly, unless you have a pair of wings
I'm not seeing, I doubt you can reach the
<clr:0000>monsters up there<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>I'll just have to hang tight and wait for my
friends to notice I'm gone.
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Admiration_00>Impressive!<sp:5:1:0> So you can defeat those
<clr:0000>monsters <clr:ffff>way high up, huh?

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>All right!<sp:5:0:0> I'll handle the rest of them!<sp:5:1:0>
...Wait, no. I can't do that.
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Trouble_01>Grr! If I didn't have these supplies to
protect, they'd be monster meat by now!
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Now, I better deliver these supplies before
more monsters show up. Take care!
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Shitauchi_01>The moment I let my guard down, they'll
steal the supplies.
Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Trouble>I'm glad you spotted my signal fire, but
<clr:0000>these monsters can fly<clr:ffff>, and you can't.<sp:5:0:0>
See the problem?<sp:0:4:0>Guess I'll just wait for my friends to see
me out here.
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>You there! <sp:5:0:0>Are you here because you
noticed my signal fire?<sp:0:4:0>It's about time someone did. See, I got
spotted by some <clr:0000>monsters<clr:ffff>.
Talk12_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>As much as I'd like to handle the rest
of those <clr:0000>monsters<clr:ffff>, I can't.
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Trouble_01>They want to snatch the supplies
I collected from Snowfield Stable.<sp:0:4:0>Those pests... <sp:5:0:0>Normally I'd have dealt
with them, no problem.
